name: Ensemble
intro: Uncover the Artifacts of the Creative Process
introduce: Ensemble is a platform where artists sell the artifacts from their creative process and tell the story behind it. Artifacts are pieces from the creative process of a project, sold as Non-Fungible Tokens, (NFTs) on the Ethereum Blockchain. Examples could include early demos of a song, storyboards from a film, or rough drafts of a visual artwork.
